  runtime: shiny

Column {data-width=300}
-------------------------------------

### Input Panel  
    
```{r}
selectInput("myVar", label = "Choose a number:",
            choices = c(10, 20, 30), selected = 20)
```
    
    
Column {data-width=700}  
-------------------------------------
### Output Panel  

```{r}
renderPlot({
  hist(rnorm(1000), as.numeric(input$myVar))
})
```
